Text:
No sample? I'd download this if it were less than 400MB, but at almost 700, i'll just download UnKnOwN's and get one that's slightly less recompressed.

@CRY/maximersk: h264's main strength is low bitrates, so there's actually not much diff between, say, 695 MB and 350 MB. Not until you drop the video bitrate below 350-400 do you start to see a noticeable drop in quality. I'd also strongly recommend the MP4 package over MKV.
dude mp4 really over mkv I think not!! !! mkv files are always better when the uploader knows what he is doing keep up the good work
